original: Linse, Nils Rudolf, civilingenjör, Jönköping, f. 15/7/84 i Klågerup, Mal-möh. L — Mog:ex. i Lund 04, KTH (E) 04-07, stud. v. Techn. Hochsclmle, Berlin-Charlottenburg, 08-09. Rit. v. Nya Fören. Elektr. A-B i Sthlm 07-08, ing. v. AEG i Berlin 09-12, driftsing. v. Malmö stads elverk 12-15, repr. i Ryssl. f. Jönköp. Mek. Verkst. A-B 15-17, verkst. dir. f. Société Anonyme Gentele & Co. i Moskva 18-20, chef f. Juneverkens försäljn :kont. i Sthlm 20-22, förest, f. Luleå stads elverk 23-27, chef f. Jönköp. stads gas- o. elverk samt spårv. sed. 27, tillika verkst. dir. f. Södra Vetterns Kraft A-B o. Jönköp.-Huskvarna Trafikbol. sed. 27 resp. 32. RVO.
translated: Linse, Nils Rudolf, civil engineer, Jönköping, b. 15/7/84 in Klågerup, Malmöhus. Graduated from Lund University in 1904, KTH (E) 04-07, studied at Technische Hochschule in Berlin-Charlottenburg, 08-09. Worked as a draftsman at Nya Förenade Elektriska Aktiebolaget in Stockholm 07-08, engineer at AEG in Berlin 09-12, power engineer at Malmö City Power Plant 12-15, representative in Russia for Jönköpings Mekaniska Verkstads Aktiebolag 15-17, managing director of Société Anonyme Gentele & Co. in Moscow 18-20, head of sales department at Juneverkens försäljkontor in Stockholm 20-22, superintendent of Luleå City Power Plant 23-27, chief of Jönköping City Gas and Power Plant and Tramway since 27, also managing director of Södra Vetterns Kraft Aktiebolag and Jönköping-Huskvarna Trafikbolag since 27 and 32 respectively. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa.

worksFor.name: Jönköping City Gas and Power Plant
